name: Our Last Spring
description:
You live in a peaceful forest, along with nature and life and beauty. One night, you wake up in the middle of the night to find something strange: there's creatures leaving in the forest, and they've been attacked by something evil. Something that only you can defeat, and that way, save the spring.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move 

"K" to place bomb flowers

CREDITS

This game was made by me using the Godot engine, Aseprite, Gimp and Bfxr
